author: Gbenga Akingbule
title: Nigerian Schoolgirls Freed After Kidnapping by Islamist Militants
text:
ABUJA, Nigeria—An Islamist group in Nigeria that kidnapped 110 students from a girls’ boarding school in February released most of the children early Wednesday, government officials and witnesses said. 
The fighters, presumed to be from Islamic State West Africa Province, a breakaway faction of jihadist group Boko Haram, handed over at least 76 of the girls, according to an official statement, after “back-channel efforts.”
